data.introduce:
AirFareStorePreview对应的是黑屏中QTE之后使用的DFSQ:T指令
通过传入QTE运价计算参数，能够得到实际穿入PNR的运价各项横式的预览，可以直接将结果展示，用于辅助后续的运价穿入操作。
data.business: 黑屏DFSQ:T是国际运价计算指令QTE后的操作，选取目标运价与QTE指令有上下文的联系关系，AirFareStorePreview接口由于没有上上文，就需要用户将QTE的条件作为参数设置，包含了PNR，所需运价的金额以及FBC，还有对应的旅客序号等等
data.functions:
支持国际运价计算穿入运价的横式信息展示
支持多旅客结果预览
支持多旅客类型结果预览
结果中涉及的是FC、FN、FP、EI、TC以及RMK项的各项内容
data.requestSchema: [{"name":"TES_AirFareStorePreviewRQ","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"SITA_AirfarePriceRQ","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"OTA_AirPriceRQ","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"？","children":[{"name":"POS","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"Source","type":"object","quantity":"0..5","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"@PseudoCityCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Office号","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"TravelerInfoSummary","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"旅客信息","children":[{"name":"AirTravelerAvail","type":"object","quantity":"0..99","default":"","description":"Specify passenger numbers\n                and types","children":[{"name":"PassengerTypeQuantity","type":"object","quantity":"0..10","default":"","description":"指定运价类型对应旅客信息","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"旅客类型","children":[]},{"name":"@Quantity","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"旅客人数","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"PriceRequestInformation","type":"object","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"NegotiatedFareCode","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"大客户编码","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[]}]},{"name":"@NegotiatedFaresOnly","type":"boolean","quantity":"1","default":"false","description":"是否只查询大客户运价","children":[]},{"name":"@CurrencyCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"OB费货币类型","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"BookingReferenceID","type":"object","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"PNR信息","children":[{"name":"@ID","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"PNR","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"AdditionalPriceRQData","type":"object","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"附加信息","children":[{"name":"TicketingCarrier","type":"object","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"出票航空公司","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[]}]},{"name":"AdditionalSegmentInfos","type":"object","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"航段信息","children":[{"name":"AdditionalSegmentInfo","type":"object","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"@SegmentRPH","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航段编号","children":[]},{"name":"@RuleTariff","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[]},{"name":"@RuleNumber","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[]},{"name":"@FareReference","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"FareTypeInfo","type":"object","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"票价类型","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Fare Type","children":[]}]},{"name":"@FareCurrencySelection","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[]},{"name":"@TicketingFeeInd","type":"boolean","quantity":"1","default":"false","description":"是否获取OB费","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"FareInfos","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"运价信息","children":[{"name":"FareInfo","type":"array","quantity":"0..99","default":"","description":"出票运价，每种旅客类型的出票运价","children":[{"name":"PassengerTypeQuantity","type":"object","quantity":"0..10","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"旅客类型","children":[]}]},{"name":"BaseFare","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"基础运价：不包含税的票价","children":[{"name":"@Amount","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"OB费金额","children":[]},{"name":"@CurrencyCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[]}]},{"name":"TotalTax","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"总税费","children":[{"name":"@Amount","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[]},{"name":"@CurrencyCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[]}]},{"name":"FareBasisCodes","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"运价基础信息","children":[{"name":"FareBasisCode","type":"string","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"运价基础","children":[]}]},{"name":"TicketingFee","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"OB费","children":[{"name":"@Amount","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"OB费货币金额","children":[]},{"name":"@CurrencyCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"OB费货币类型","children":[]}]},{"name":"@RPH","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"指定运价标志","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"PassengerNames","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"PassengerName","type":"array","quantity":"0..99","default":"","description":"旅客姓名对应运价信息","children":[{"name":"FareRPH","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"指定旅客对应运价信息","children":[]},{"name":"Surname","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"指定旅客姓名","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"@MinGroupFareInd","type":"boolean","quantity":"1","default":"false","description":"是否使用小团价出票","children":[]}]}]

<TES_AirFareStorePreviewRQ MinGroupFareInd="true">
    <SITA_AirfarePriceRQ>
        <OTA_AirPriceRQ>
            <POS>
                <Source PseudoCityCode="SHA384"/>
            </POS>
            <TravelerInfoSummary>
                <AirTravelerAvail>
                    <PassengerTypeQuantity Code="ADT" Quantity="2"/>
                    <PassengerTypeQuantity Code="CNN" Quantity="1"/>
                </AirTravelerAvail>
                <PriceRequestInformation CurrencyCode="CNY"/>
            </TravelerInfoSummary>
            <BookingReferenceID ID="KWPVTC"/>
        </OTA_AirPriceRQ>
        <AdditionalPriceRQData>
            <TicketingCarrier Code="CA"/>
        </AdditionalPriceRQData>
    </SITA_AirfarePriceRQ>
    <FareInfos>
        <FareInfo RPH="1">
            <PassengerTypeQuantity Code="ADT"/>
            <BaseFare CurrencyCode="CNY" Amount="4180"/>
            <TotalTax CurrencyCode="CNY" Amount="225"/>
            <FareBasisCodes>
                <FareBasisCode>YOFFSS</FareBasisCode>
            </FareBasisCodes>
        </FareInfo>
        <FareInfo RPH="2">
            <PassengerTypeQuantity Code="CNN"/>
            <BaseFare CurrencyCode="CNY" Amount="3140"/>
            <TotalTax CurrencyCode="CNY" Amount="135"/>
            <FareBasisCodes>
                <FareBasisCode>YOFFSS</FareBasisCode>
            </FareBasisCodes>
        </FareInfo>
    </FareInfos>
    <PassengerNames>
